Title: BUG #6097: Server crash when enabling custom_variable_classes
Description: Server crash when enabling custom_variable_classes on the fly

Title: auto_explain causes cluster crash if pg_ctl reload is used (not pg_ctl restart)
Assertion failure on reload of GUC_SUPERUSER_ONLY parms
Description: when you modify a GUC_SUPERUSER_ONLY parameter, such as log_filename, in postgresql.conf and then reload you will get the assertion failure

Title: BUG #13471: Reload with include_dir results in incorrect errors message
Description: using include_dir and reload makes crash

Title: Can't connect to my postgresql
Description: with password file losing，do sighup crash system

Title: Postgres crashed on invalid IP entry in pg_hba.conf
Description:
database was crashed as soon as we added an invlid
entry in the pg_hba.conf file.

Title: Buffer overflow when continuously send SIGHUP to postgres
Description: Buffer overflow when continuously send SIGHUP to postgres

Title: BUG #3589：/etc/postgresql/postgresql.conf log_statement
Description: commented-out the log_statement=true. didn't take effect on the option
Root Cause: Fail to consider loading updated values

Title: Archiver not picking up changes to archive_command
Description: updating archive_command on the fly，but didn't take effect
Root Cause: Fail to consider handling updated values

Title: BUG #11350: ALTER SYSTEM is not DDL?
Description:
When set 'log_statement=ddl' and execute ALTER SYSTEM,
any log messages are not outputted.

Title: log_collector doesn't respond to reloads
Description: after updating log_directory，system still continues to log to the old directory

Title: BUG #5759: Autovacuum cost limit trends to 1, using default config
Description: start everything up with autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit=200.  You'll get three processes each with cost_limit=66. Then change that to -1 in the config. The launcher will launch new worker processes with autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit=-1.   After each table completes, you'll see the cost_limit drop.

Title: BUG #16666: Slight memory leak when running pg_ctl reload
Description: for these string type PGC_POSTMASTER GUC variables like 'unix_socket_directories', the following code segment will leak newval's memory

Title: BUG #16160: Minor memory leak in case of starting postgres server with SSL encryption
Description: updating ssl_crl_file with wrong value. sighup caused memery leak or OOM
